name: Log your Aircall data in Google Sheets
description: Every time a new call is received on Aircall, Make will automatically store information about the call in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example document](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1x2De5gqEKmt4mCi_i8EIqQTSYU9wXCjeyRQgPlagCf8/edit?usp=sharing).
